screenshot.caption: FLAC file open in Adobe Audition 2021

description: FLAC reduces the size of digital audio by approximately 60 percent and is widely supported across popular platforms. The format is open-source and developed by the Xiph.Org Foundation.

A FLAC Fingerprint file, which contains the filename and checksum information for a FLAC file, may be generated along with the FLAC file. This file is typically named ffp.txt and can be created using the following command:
